title: Technology & The Internet
part1: How often do you use the internet?
What are your favorite websites or apps?
Do you think you use your mobile phone too much?
How has the internet changed your life?

part2.cue_card_topic: Describe a time you were frustrated by a piece of technology.
cue_card_points: what piece of technology it was
and explain how you felt about the experience.

part3: Do you think older people are afraid of new technology?
What are the advantages and disadvantages of children using smartphones?
How can people protect their personal information online?
Will artificial intelligence be more intelligent than humans in the future?
